title: New: Blaue Blume – Helen
body:
After what feels like forever, Danish quartet **Blaue Blume** release the follow up to their stunning debut track, [_On New Years Eve_](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/20650-new-blaue-blume-on-new-years-eve/). _Helen_, self-described by the band as narrating the story of ‘the denied lover desperately \[seeking\] answers in his misery’, and as to be expected, the vocals are as entrancing as ever. Part Alt-J, part Wild Beasts, it’s further proof that the Copenhagen band are one of the most exciting prospects around at this present moment. Check out _Helen_ below, and be sure to catch them at one of their debut UK shows (dates after the jump).
